Debugging standalone package

12 months ago
  1. Launch SATurn with the Chrome Developer Tools hook enabled

    $SATURN/build/Saturn_dev.bat

  2. Open Chrome and navigate to the following address

    http://localhost:9000/

  3. Click on the only link to enter developer tools
  4. Note that to do the equivalent of a hard reset to clear the cache in the QT window you will need to click on

    Network->Disable Cache

  5. Then right-click in the QT window and reload the page
